programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Sci-fi action drama starring Tom Cruise and Emily Blunt. After being killed on his first day of combat in a war against aliens, Major William Cage finds himself in a time loop, living the same day over and over again. Gaining more knowledge each time he is killed, Cage realises that the key to victory is for him to keep on dying Doug Liman - Director Tom Cruise - Major William Cage Emily Blunt - Rita Vrataski Bill Paxton - Master Sergeant Farell Brendan Gleeson - General Brigham Jonas Armstrong - Skinner Noah Taylor - Dr Carter Tony Way - Kimmel Kick Gurry - Griff Franz Drameh - Ford Dragomir Mrsic - Kuntz Charlotte Riley - Nance Terence Maynard - Cruel sergeant Lara Pulver - Karen Lord Tom Cruise - Major William Cage Emily Blunt - Rita Vrataski Bill Paxton - Master Sergeant Farell Brendan Gleeson - General Brigham Jonas Armstrong - Skinner Noah Taylor - Dr Carter Tony Way - Kimmel Kick Gurry - Griff Franz Drameh - Ford Dragomir Mrsic - Kuntz Charlotte Riley - Nance Terence Maynard - Cruel sergeant Lara Pulver - Karen Lord.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Mystery ║ 1979 ║ PG
programme.desc: The first sci-fi adventure movie based on the cult TV series, starring William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy. An unknown and awesome force is heading towards Federation space, on a direct course for Earth. programme.title: Back to the Future Part III
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Western, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 1990 ║ PG
programme.desc: Third instalment in the blockbuster comedy adventure series, starring Michael J Fox and Christopher Lloyd. programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure sequel starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and Ricardo Montalban. In the 23rd century, Admiral James T Kirk is a guest aboard the Enterprise, which is taking part in a training exercise. programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: Blockbuster fantasy adventure starring Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey and Kate Bosworth. Superman returns to Metropolis after a five-year mission to look for his home planet Krypton, only to find that his former sweetheart Lois Lane has a new boyfriend and a young son. programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as 'Beekeepers', he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. programme.title: Transformers: Rise Of The Beasts
programme.sub-title: Action, Sci Fi, Fantasy, War, Drama ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: In 1994 New York City, ex-serviceman Noah Diaz accepts a job from neighbourhood chancer Reek to steal a sports car. programme.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honour Among Thieves
programme.desc: Following the death of his wife, lute-playing bard Edgin abandons a noble pledge and turns to petty thievery with his surrogate sister, exiled barbarian Holga. programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins, Helena Bonham Carter and Johnny Flynn. programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins, Helena Bonham Carter and Johnny Flynn. In 1938, young British stockbroker Nicholas Winton visits Prague and becomes involved in an audacious plan to evacuate hundreds of Jewish children before the Nazis close the borders. Decades later, Winton's records of the mission reawaken painful memories of the youngsters he couldn't save - and set him on an unexpected path to laying his ghosts to rest James Hawes - Director Anthony Hopkins - Nicholas Winton Helena Bonham Carter - Babette Winton Johnny Flynn - Nicholas, as a young man Lena Olin - Grete Winton Romola Garai - Doreen Warriner Jonathan Pryce - Martin Blake Ziggy Heath - Martin Blake, as a young man Adrian Rawlins - Geoff Samantha Spiro - Esther Rantzen Marthe Keller - Betty Maxwell Alex Sharp - Trevor Anthony Hopkins - Nicholas Winton Helena Bonham Carter - Babette Winton Johnny Flynn - Nicholas, as a young man Lena Olin - Grete Winton Romola Garai - Doreen Warriner Jonathan Pryce - Martin Blake Ziggy Heath - Martin Blake, as a young man Adrian Rawlins - Geoff Samantha Spiro - Esther Rantzen Marthe Keller - Betty Maxwell Alex Sharp - Trevor.

programme.desc: (1987) Uma (Rekha), the eldest daughter in law, strives hard to bring her estranged family together and keep her home intact. A family drama starring Raj Babbar and Anupam Kher.

programme.title: Laadla
programme.desc: Raj (Anil Kapoor) is a union leader with considerable clout over the workers. He marries the factory's owner Sheetal (Sridevi), little knowing that she is his biggest enemy.

programme.title: Chalta Purza
programme.desc: Amar, a young and an honest man, is desperately in search of work in order to make ends meet for his mother and himself. Eventually, he gets a chance to work with the underworld.

programme.title: Nanu Ki Jaanu
programme.desc: (2018) (Movie@6) Nanu, a land mafia agent, tries to rescue a woman who met with an accident. The woman, however, dies but her ghost arrives in Nanu's apartment.

programme.title: Badlapur
programme.desc: Huma Qureshi and Varun Dhawan praised with the Best Actor - Actress Award for this movie.

programme.title: Happy Phirr Bhag Jayegi
programme.desc: (2018) A woman who travels to China to find her fiance, gets mistakenly kidnapped by some goons who were to abduct another woman of the same name travelling by the same flight.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Madhura Raja
programme.desc: Raja, a lionhearted man, heads to the village of Pambinthurthu to protect the people who are being terrorised by a local criminal and illegal liquor merchant, Nadeshan.

programme.title: Kisna: The Warrior Poet
programme.desc: (2005) Kisna (Vivek Oberoi) pledges to take Catherine, his childhood friend back to England when freedom fighters vow to kill her. This is the story of their love and journey.

programme.title: Jheel Ke US Paar
programme.desc: Jal Mistry won an award for 'Best Cinematography' at the Filmfare Awards 1974.

programme.title: Namaste England
programme.desc: Param and Jasmeet's relationship undergoes stress and changes as they struggle to fulfil their dreams of relocating to England. Staring Arjun Kapoor and Parineeti Chopra.

programme.title: Saina
programme.desc: The story of Saina Nehwal, a professional badminton player who ranked number 1 in the sport.

programme.title: Code Name: Tiranga
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Tasked with capturing a wanted criminal, an undercover spy sets out on a perilous mission. However, things become complicated when her heart is pulled into it.

programme.title: Jabariya Jodi
programme.desc: Abhay, a righteous thug, forcefully kidnaps grooms who demand dowry and later marries them off. Babli, his childhood sweetheart, re-enters his life and changes his priorities.

programme.title: Rascals
programme.desc: Chetan and Bhagat are masters at their profession of conning people. They fall in love with Khushi and try to win her over. Anthony, an old victim of their cons, kidnaps Khushi.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Judaa Hoke BHI
programme.desc: A married couple struggling with an unimaginable loss are further torn apart when they are lured under false pretences to Uttarakhand separately.

programme.title: Sangam
programme.desc: Sangam was a blockbuster and the highest grossing film of the year. The film won many awards at Bengal Film Journalists Association Awards and 12th Filmfare Awards - 1965.

programme.title: Ek Hi Bhool
programme.desc: (1981) A moment of passion between Ram (Jeetendra) and his wife's good friend ends his marriage with Sadhna (Rekha). They meet years later. Will their son bring them together?

programme.title: Teri Meri Kahaani
programme.desc: (2012) The story takes us through a journey of eternal love between a couple who have vowed to love each other not only in this life but in every life to follow.

programme.title: Chup
programme.desc: A lonesome florist with a new-found love interest and a psychopath killer who targets film critics in Mumbai. Are the two related? Inspector Arvind Mathur and Dr. Zenobia are about to find out.

programme.title: Radhe Shyam
programme.desc: (Movie @6) World-renowned palmist Vikramaditya falls head over heels in love with doctor Prerana on a train journey. However, the lovers must rewrite their destiny and even cheat death to be together.

programme.title: Saaho
programme.desc: (2019) While trying to catch a smart thief, an undercover agent and his partner realise that the case is linked to the murder of a crime lord.

programme.title: Saaho
programme.desc: While trying to catch a smart thief, an undercover agent and his partners realise that the case is linked to the murder of a crime lord. (2019).

programme.title: Aakhree Raasta

programme.title: Aakhri Raasta
programme.desc: (1986) A conflict comes between a father and his son (both played by Amitabh Bachchan) when the father seeks revenge for the rape and murder of his wife, only to be stopped by his son.

programme.title: Jism
programme.desc: (2003) Kabir (John Abraham) loves a married lady named Sonia (Bipasha) who instigates him to kill her husband. Kabir agrees, unaware that Sonia has other plans up her sleeve.

programme.title: Sagar
programme.desc: These films praised with many categorical awards like Best Actor, Best Actress, Best Supporting Role - Male, Best Playback Singer - Male.

programme.desc: Sachin, Sadhana Singh.

programme.desc: Ayananka Bose won an award for the 'Best Cinematography' at the Zee Cine Awards 2011.

programme.title: Freaky Ali

programme.title: Velle
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Three criminals, a runaway girl, her three best friends, an aspiring director and a star cross path due to an incident. Will they come off better for it or worse?

programme.title: Akhanda

programme.title: Shaadi Mein Zaroor Aana
programme.desc: Jyotica Tangri won theBest Female Playback Singer in Zee Cine Awards.

programme.title: Socha Na Tha
programme.desc: (2005) Viren can't imagine having an arranged marriage. His parents want him to meet Aditi. They refuse to get married but stay friends. Will Cupid strike and change their minds?

programme.title: Lal Baadshah
programme.desc: (1999) K. C. Bokadia directs Amitabh Bachchan as Lal Baadshah in this action film where he plays the role of a messiah and clashes against the deadly Dhayal Singh (Amrish Puri).

programme.title: Mohra
programme.desc: Chinni Prakash won the Filmfare award for 'Best Choreography' in 1995.

programme.title: Kaala Sona

programme.title: Gadar... Ek Prem Katha
programme.desc: The film was declared an 'All-Time Blockbuster' by Box Office and won many awards including 'Best Actor, Best Actress, Best Story, Best Director, Best actor in a negative role'.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins, Helena Bonham Carter and Johnny Flynn. In 1938, young British stockbroker Nicholas Winton visits Prague and becomes involved in an audacious plan to evacuate hundreds of Jewish children before the Nazis close the borders. Decades later, Winton's records of the mission reawaken painful memories of the youngsters he couldn't save - and set him on an unexpected path to laying his ghosts to rest James Hawes - Director Anthony Hopkins - Nicholas Winton Helena Bonham Carter - Babette Winton Johnny Flynn - Nicholas, as a young man Lena Olin - Grete Winton Romola Garai - Doreen Warriner Jonathan Pryce - Martin Blake Ziggy Heath - Martin Blake, as a young man Adrian Rawlins - Geoff Samantha Spiro - Esther Rantzen Marthe Keller - Betty Maxwell Alex Sharp - Trevor Anthony Hopkins - Nicholas Winton Helena Bonham Carter - Babette Winton Johnny Flynn - Nicholas, as a young man Lena Olin - Grete Winton Romola Garai - Doreen Warriner Jonathan Pryce - Martin Blake Ziggy Heath - Martin Blake, as a young man Adrian Rawlins - Geoff Samantha Spiro - Esther Rantzen Marthe Keller - Betty Maxwell Alex Sharp - Trevor.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins, Helena Bonham Carter and Johnny Flynn. In 1938, young British stockbroker Nicholas Winton visits Prague and becomes involved in an audacious plan to evacuate hundreds of Jewish children before the Nazis close the borders. programme.desc: Competition is fierce as local merchant Robert and wife Kelly open up a fish and chip restaurant. Plus, follow the journey of the turbot as it goes from sea to the dinner plate. (4/10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 1st Test Hlts
programme.desc: England's three-Test tour of Pakistan begins with day one in Multan against Shan Masood's men, as Brendon McCullum's red-ball outfit set out to replicate 2022's 3-0 whitewash. (07.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 1st Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day two of the opening Test between Pakistan and England in Multan. Centuries from Shan Masood and Abdullah Shafique see Pakistan resume play on 328 for four. (08.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 1st Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day three of England's opening Test match of three against Pakistan in Multan. The tourists resume play on 96 for one in reply to Pakistan's mammoth score of 556 all out. (09.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 1st Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day four of the first Test in Multan. England's new leading run-scorer in Test cricket Joe Root returns to the crease as the tourists close in on Pakistan's total of 556 all out. (10.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 1st Test Hlts
programme.desc: An 86-over record partnership of 454 between England's Joe Root and Harry Brook has the tourists on the brink of a memorable win, as Pakistan trail by 115 runs on day five. (11.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 2nd Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day one of the second Test between Pakistan and England in Multan. The opener saw the tourists defeat the hosts in extraordinary fashion, winning by an innings and 47 runs. (15.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 2nd Test Hlts
programme.desc: Pakistan resume day two of the second Test in Multan on 259 for five. In place of Babar Azam, debutant Kamran Ghulam hit a century before being removed by England's Shoaib Bashir. (16.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 2nd Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day three of the second Test between Pakistan and England. A pivotal final session yesterday saw momentum shift the way of the hosts, as England resume play on 239 for six. (17.10).

programme.title: Pakistan v England 2nd Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day four of the second Test in a three-match series between Pakistan and England in Multan. (18.10).
